New Records: Jackson Chourio became the youngest player to hit a leadoff homer in the postseason
Jackson Chourio is the second-youngest player to homer twice in a postseason game
Key Match Events: Garrett Mitchell hit a two-run shot in the 8th inning to give the Brewers a 5-3 victory
Jackson Chourio tied the game in the 8th with his second homer of the night
Milwaukee trailed 3-2 when Chourio led off the 8th by homering to right-center
Pre-Game Insights: The Brewers will attempt to become the first team to win a best-of-three Wild Card Series after losing the opener since MLB went to this expanded playoff format in 2022
Post-Match Reflections: Milwaukee had been 0-26 in the postseason when trailing going into the 8th inning
The Mets took the lead in the 2nd inning after a Brewers pitcher made a critical mistake around first base
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series is now tied 1-1 and will continue with Game 3 on Thursday
The Mets will have their seasons on the line in Game 3
The game was played at American Family Field with a attendance of 40,350
